patterns: is thapar a university or institute
responses: Founded in 1956, Thapar Institute of Engineering & Technology (TIET) is one of the oldest and finest institutions of India, producing world class engineers by imparting quality education for 65+ years. With a campus spread across sprawling 250 acres, TIET, located at the heart of the beautiful city of Patiala, has been breaking new grounds in engineering education,research and innovation.It has been ranked 28th in 'Engineering' category in the top Engineering Institutes in the country and 31st in ‘University’ category in the NIRF rankings, and has been accredited with an 'A+' grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).

responses: Our university offers Bio Medical Engineering,Bio Technology,Chemical Engineering,Civil Engineering,Computer Engineering ,Computer Science and Engineering,Electrical Engineering,Electronics and Computer Engineering,etc

In an attempt to allow the students at TIET to gain a truly world-class educational experience, TIET has started an International Engineering program with the world’s leading varsities like Trinity College in Dublin, Ireland; University of New South Wales, Australia; Leeds University in The UK; University of Queensland, Australia & Toledo University in the United States.After completing the first two year at TIET, these student join the partner university. At the end of the program the student receives th UG degrees from the partner varsity visit for detailed information about the same. ,

Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology offers scholarships to deserving candidates, keeping in mind all the necessary criteria. Here at Thapar, we believe that hard work must be rewarded which would further play an eminent role in a student's academic as well as co-curricular life.Students at TIET will be given various Scholarships based on 10+2 aggregate marks and AIR of JEE Main - 2022. Scholarships will also be issued based on the financial status of a student. During their university tenure, scholarships are offered at specific levels.The detail about the scholarships that are offered to the students based on eligibility criteria are mentioned on Thapar's official website.For details and updates visit here
